about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wonderful World of "Cozy Dash"!

In this charming top-down adventure, players can choose to play as a cunning snake or a nimble apple, facing off against time and traps in an exciting challenge. Offering both cooperative and competitive gameplay.

Players will control a flexible snake chasing a clever apple, avoiding counterattacks while tackling levels filled with traps and enemies.

Whether playing solo against AI or competing with friends in local multiplayer, endless fun awaits!

Game Modes:

  • Single-player Mode: Compete against AI and challenge yourself by playing as either the snake or the apple. Can you outsmart the AI and become the ultimate escape artist?

  • Local Multiplayer Mode: Team up or compete with friends! Experience the thrill of an intense chase in an exciting head-to-head battle.

Game Features:

  • Snake vs. Apple Mode: A thrilling chase-and-counterattack duel—beware, the apple can strike back with fireballs! Dodge skillfully and claim victory!

  • Dual Snake Mode: A modern twist on the classic snake game—colliding with the opponent's tail means defeat. Test your skills against friends!

  • Survival Mode: The snake and apple join forces to fend off waves of enemies and traps, testing teamwork and survival strategies.

  • Diverse Enemies and Traps: Encounter various enemies and avoid hazards such as falling meteors, shooting cannons, and more in each exciting round.

  • Power-ups and Boosts: Collect coins and treasure chests to gain speed boosts, fireball abilities, and other powerful upgrades to change the course of the game.

  • Steam Achievements: Challenge yourself, unlock achievements, and prove you're the ultimate player!

Unique Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Dynamic Chase System: The snake must capture the apple while avoiding traps such as meteors and falling rocks. Watch out for cannons that fire projectiles and deadly dead ends!

  • Collectibles and Power-ups: Gather coins scattered across the map to boost your speed and unlock stylish hats in the wardrobe system. Discover treasure chests for extra lives, speed boosts, and temporary fireball abilities.

  • Stamina and Sprinting: Manage your stamina wisely! Sprint to victory, but be careful—strategic energy management is key to outpacing your opponent.

  • Intense Endgame Phase: In the final 30 seconds, the game speeds up! Both the snake and apple move faster, and the music intensifies, heightening the excitement.

Diverse Maps:

  • Explore different environments, from the lush spring meadows to the scorching summer heat and the warm autumn sun. Each map offers a unique experience.

Outfit System:

  • Players can purchase and freely change their character's hats using in-game currency. Each hat features a unique and adorable design, allowing players to mix and match to create their own personalized look, adding fun and creativity to the game.

Weapon System:

  • Players can purchase and freely switch weapons for their characters using gold. Each weapon comes with unique skills, such as fireballs, bombs, plasma, etc.

  • Players can mix and match these weapons during gameplay to create their own custom loadouts, enjoying the fun and creativity that comes with switching gear.


Controls:

  • Fully supports controller gameplay

  • Supports local multiplayer on the same keyboard

Difficulty Settings:

  • Multiple difficulty levels allow players to customize the experience, extending playtime or increasing the challenge.

Enemy Types:

  • Encounter adorable yet challenging enemies such as slimes, squirrels, and turtles—each with unique attack patterns that add variety to every match.

Join the fun in "Cozy Dash"—every match is a heart-pounding pursuit! Will you be the snake that captures the apple, or the apple that outsmarts the snake and claims victory?

Get ready for the ultimate showdown!

A special thanks to my dear friend Robin Lyu for crafting an amazing trailer for me! Your creativity and dedication have brought the game to life in a truly unique way, and I sincerely appreciate all your hard work!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel Core 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel Core 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Cozy Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: Not required
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: Not required
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cozy Dash is a fun-filled local multiplayer game where players can choose to be the cunning Snake or the elusive Apple. In this intense chase, the Snake must pursue the Apple while avoiding various traps and obstacles. The game aims for a fast-paced gameplay experience.
